li.label: ate nutrient paste
li.description: I ate slimy nutrient-paste from a tube. The gear-oil from the machine gives a bit of variety to the taste, I guess.

li.label: ate nutrient brick
li.description: I ate a brick of dehydrated nutrient-paste. I'd like to say that it tastes just as bad, but now it also tastes burnt, from the dehydration process.
